display elabel brief
Slot      BoardType            BarCode                         Description
================================================================================
BACKPLANE  CX6Z1BKPE           00000000000000000000
LPU 1      CR57LPUF120A03      00000000000000000000            LPUF-51-E
  PIC 1    CR57L2XFE0          0000000000000000                P51-E-2x10GBase LAN/WAN-SFP+
LPU 2      CR52LPUF40B         00000000000000000000            LPUF-40-B
  PIC 1    CR52L2XXN0          0000000000000000                P40-2x10GBase LAN/WAN-XFP
VSU 3      CR57VSUF8000        00000000000000000000            VSUF80
MPU 4      CX61MPUD2           00000000000000000000            MPUD2
MPU 5      CX61MPUD2           00000000000000000000            MPUD2
PWR 8
  PEM 0    CR52PEMA            00000000000000000000
PWR 9
  PEM 0    CR52PEMA            00000000000000000000
FAN 10     CR52FCBG            00000000000000000000
